description:
Outfitted with Lezyne’s Alert technology, this little taillight gets brighter when you brake, and flashes when you stop. Whether your riding in traffic or in a pack, Alert lets those around you know when you’re slowing and when you’re stopped. The Strip Alert Drive light has 5 different settings from an economy flash to an eye-catching daytime flash. 5 powerful red LEDs and a custom engineered reflector add over 270° of visibility. The tool-free mount fits round seat posts or aero posts, so you can swap it between your trusty commuter and your race bike.

  • 5 lighting modes, 2 in steady and 3 in flashing; steady: 35 lumens (4h), 3 lumens (27h), flash 1 – 25 lumens (8.5h), flash 2 – 25 lumens (10.5h) and day flash – 150 lumens (5.5h)
  • Alert mode gets brighter under braking and flashes when you come to a stop
  • Alert mode works across all light settings
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Wide-angle lens that provides over 270° of visibility
  • Aero post compatible mount
  • Easy USB charging via micro-USB takes only about 2 hours
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting straps
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne Strip Alert Drive Rear Light
